name: JointConnector
shortDescription: Create and manage physics joints between two objects.
description: - Joint is created at the center of the Joint Connector object
- Two objects are connected but can rotate on the joint
- Angles can be restricted and joints can have motors that spin the objects
- Joint is created at the center of the Joint Connector object
- Two objects are forced to stay at set distance from each other
- Adjust the frequency property to change the stiffness of the spring
- Center of both objects must be inside the Joint Connector collision mask
- Two objects can get closer to each other but they cannot exceed their starting distance
- Center of both objects must be inside the Joint Connector collision mask

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Create and manage revolute joints between two objects.
Also known as a hinge joint because the objects act like they are connected with a hinge that pivots.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: RevoluteJoint

eventsFunctions.description: Set the breaking force of a joint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set the breaking force of a joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetBreakingForce
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the breaking force of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Break revolute joint if it exceeds breaking force
eventsFunctions.name: BreakJointIfNeeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Break revolute joint on _PARAM2_ (that was created by _PARAM0_) if it exceeds breaking force

propertyDescriptors.label: Motor strength (torque) of joint
propertyDescriptors.description: If motor speed is 0, then the motor will try to prevent rotation based on motor torque.
propertyDescriptors.name: MotorTorque

propertyDescriptors.label: Motor rotation speed of joint
propertyDescriptors.description: Use negative values to rotate in the opposite direction.

propertyDescriptors.label: Angle movement allowed in clockwise direction (degrees)

propertyDescriptors.label: Breaking force
propertyDescriptors.description: Force required to break joint apart
propertyDescriptors.name: BreakingForce

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Create and manage weld joints between two objects.
Also known as a static joint because the objects stay glued in the same relative position to each other.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: WeldJoint

eventsFunctions.description: Break weld joint if it exceeds breaking force.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Break weld joint if it exceeds breaking force
eventsFunctions.name: BreakJointIfNeeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Break weld joint on _PARAM2_ (that was created by _PARAM0_) if it exceeds breaking force

eventsFunctions.description: Set the breaking force of a joint.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set the breaking force of a joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetBreakingForce
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the breaking force of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Set frequency of joint.  Range: 0 to 60 (or the maximum FPS of game).
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set frequency of joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetFrequency
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set joint frequency of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

propertyDescriptors.label: Frequency
propertyDescriptors.description: Set a number between 0 and 60. Higher numbers represent a stronger bond.
propertyDescriptors.name: Frequency

propertyDescriptors.label: Breaking force
propertyDescriptors.description: Force required to break joint apart
propertyDescriptors.name: BreakingForce

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Create and manage distance joints between two objects. 
Acts like a spring because the objects try to stay the same distance apart.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: DistanceJoint

eventsFunctions.description: Break distance joint if it exceeds breaking force.
eventsFunctions.fullName: Break distance joint if it exceeds breaking force
eventsFunctions.name: BreakJointIfNeeded
eventsFunctions.sentence: Break distance joint on _PARAM2_ (that was created by _PARAM0_) if it exceeds breaking force

eventsFunctions.description: Set the breaking force of a joint.

eventsFunctions.name: SetBreakingForce
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set the breaking force of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Set frequency of joint.  Range: 0 to 60 (or the maximum FPS of game).
eventsFunctions.fullName: Set frequency of joint
eventsFunctions.name: SetFrequency
eventsFunctions.sentence: Set joint frequency of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

eventsFunctions.description: Set dampting ratio of joint.  Range: 0 to 1.

eventsFunctions.sentence: Set damping ratio of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_

propertyDescriptors.label: Distance between objects
propertyDescriptors.description: Joint will attempt to keep objects at this distance apart from each other. Initial value is the starting distance of the two objects.
propertyDescriptors.name: Distance

propertyDescriptors.label: Frequency
propertyDescriptors.description: Set a number between 0 and 60. Higher numbers represent a stiffer spring.
propertyDescriptors.name: Frequency

propertyDescriptors.label: Breaking force
propertyDescriptors.description: Force required to break joint apart
propertyDescriptors.name: BreakingForce

Create and manage rope joints between two objects. 
Objects can get closer, but they cannot exceed the starting distance from each other.
